project.name: ItemMirror
project.description: ItemMirror: a library for working with XooML to promote open cross platform tool usage

AssociationEditor.name: AssociationEditor
AssociationEditor.description:
AssociationEditor is a minimal interface to represent a XooML2
association. This object is used together with FragmentEditor to
fully reprsent a XooML fragment as javascript object. It can be
converted seamlessly between an object and XML.

Note that upon construction, this doesn't actually create an
association, merely a /representation/ of an association.

There are two ways to construct an AssociationEditor:
1. Through a valid Association XML Element
2. By specifying all data through an object

For ItemMirror core developers only. Enable protected to see.

params.name: options
params.description: The options specified for the constructor

props.name: element
props.description:
A DOM element that correctly
 represents an association as specified by the XooML schema.

props.name: commonData
props.description:
An object that specifies the
 data for an association. Look at the private constructor
 `_fromOptions` for more details

FragmentEditor.name: FragmentEditor
FragmentEditor.description:
Constructs a FragmentWrapper for a XooML fragment. In the following cases.

1. XooMLFragment String is passed in and is used as the XooMLFragment
2. XooMLFragment Element is passed in and is used as the XooMLFragment.
2. Associations, XooMLDriver, ItemDriver, SyncDriver,
groupingItemURI are given and used to create a new XooMLFragment with
the given data.

The FragmentWrapper is merely a representation of a XooML fragment,
and is used by an itemMirror that actually handles the details of
creating deleting and modifying associations.

For ItemMirror core developers only. Enable protected to see.

params.name: options
params.description: Data to construct a new FragmentWrapper with

props.name: text
props.description:
Unparsed XML directly from a storage
 platform.

props.name: element
props.description:
XML Element representing a XooML
                  fragment. Required for case 1.

props.name: associations
props.description:
List of associations for the newly constructed XooMLFragment in case 2.
__optional__

props.name: commonData
props.description:
Common data for the
 fragment. Look at the constructor for more details. Required for case 2

props.name: groupingItemURI
props.description:
The URI for the grouping
 item of the fragment. Required for case 2.

ItemDriver.name: ItemDriver
ItemDriver.description:
An item utility interacts with the item storage and is responsible for
creating and deleting items. This is an implementation of item utility
using Dropbox as the item storage.

For ItemMirror core developers only. Enable protected to see.

params.name: options
params.description: Data to construct a new ItemU with

props.name: utilityURI
props.description: URI of the utility

props.name: dropboxClient
props.description: Authenticated dropbox client

ItemMirror.name: ItemMirror
ItemMirror.description:
ItemMirror represents an Item according to the XooML2 specification.

It can be instantiated using one of the following two cases based on the
given arguments.

1. XooMLFragment already exists. Given xooMLFragmentURI and xooMLDriver.
2. The XooMLFragment is created from an existing groupingItemURI (e.g., a dropbox folder).
Given a groupingItemURI, itemDriver, and a xooMLDriver a new itemMirror will be constructed for given groupingItemURI.

Throws NullArgumentException when options is null.

Throws MissingParameterException when options is not null and a required
argument is missing.

params.name: options
params.description: Data to construct a new ItemMirror with

props.name: groupingItemURI
props.description:
URI to the grouping item. Required
                 for all cases.

props.name: itemDriver
props.description:
Data for the ItemDriver to
                 construct ItemMirror with. Required for cases 2 & 3
                 Can contain any amount of optional key/value pairs for
                 the various Driver implementations.

props.name: driverURI
props.description: URI of the driver.

props.name: xooMLDriver
props.description:
Data for the XooMLDriver to
                 construct ItemMirror with. Required for all cases.
                 Can contain any amount of optional key/value pairs for
                 the various Driver implementations.

props.name: driverURI
props.description: URI of the driver.

props.name: syncDriver
props.description:
Data for the SyncDriver to
                 construct ItemMirror with. Required Case 2 & 3. Can
                 contain any amount of optional key/value pairs for
                 the various Driver implementations.

props.name: driverURI
props.description: URI of the driver.

props.name: readIfExists
props.description:
True if ItemMirror
                  should create an ItemMirror if it does not exist,
                  else false. Required for Case 2 & 3.

props.name: creator
props.description:
If being created from another
 itemMirror, specifies that itemMirror which it comes from.

params.name: callback
params.description: Function to execute once finished.

props.name: error
props.description:
Null if no error has occurred
                   in executing this function, else an contains
                   an object with the error that occurred.

props.name: itemMirror
props.description: Newly constructed ItemMirror

PathDriver.name: PathDriver
PathDriver.description:
A utility library for processing file paths. Handles any type of
file path so long as the separator is "/"

For ItemMirror core developers only. Enable protected to see.

SyncDriver.name: SyncDriver
SyncDriver.description:
An implementation of SyncDriver which syncronizes the XooML so that
it reflects the storage. This implementation ensures that only the
XooML is modified, and that the user's storage is never modified,
safely protecting any data.

For ItemMirror core developers only. Enable protected to see.

params.name: itemMirror
params.description:
The itemMirror object which you wish to
synchronize

XooMLConfig.name: XooMLConfig
XooMLConfig.description:
Configuration variables for XooML.js

For ItemMirror core developers only. Enable protected to see.

XooMLDriver.name: XooMLDriver
XooMLDriver.description:
An XooML utility interacts with an storage and is responsible for
reading and writing XooML fragments. This is an implementation of XooML utility
using Dropbox as the storage.

For ItemMirror core developers only. Enable protected to see.

params.name: options
params.description: Data to construct a new XooMLU with

props.name: fragmentURI
props.description:
The URI of fragment
contains the XooML

props.name: utilityURI
props.description: URI of the utility

props.name: dropboxClient
props.description: Authenticated dropbox client

XooMLExceptions.name: XooMLExceptions
XooMLExceptions.description:
Collection of exceptions associated with the XooML tools.

For ItemMirror core developers only. Enable protected to see.

XooMLUtil.name: XooMLUtil
XooMLUtil.description:
Collection of type checking, exception throwing, utility methods for the
XooML tools.

For ItemMirror core developers only. Enable protected to see.

Converts the object into an association element, which can then
be converted to a string or added to the DOM.

classitems.description:
The information for a given namespace. Includes both the
data, and the attributes. Namespaces URIs must be unique or
they will overwrite data from another namespace
classitems.name: namespace.URI

classitems.description:
The attributes of the current namespace, with each attribute
having a corresponding value.
classitems.name: namespace.URI.attributes

classitems.description:
This is the namespace data stored within the namespace
element. Anything can be put here, and it will be stored as a
string. ItemMirror will not do anything with the data here and
doesn't interact with it at all. It is the responsibility of
other applications to properly store information here.

supported by any of several applications.

of a fragment if it exists, else returns null.

classitems.description:
Creates an ItemMirror from the associated grouping item represented by the given GUID. Throws NullArgumentException if GUID or callback is null.
Throws InvalidTypeException if GUID is not a string, and callback is not a function.
Throws InvalidGUIDException if GUID is not a valid GUID.
classitems.name: createItemMirrorForAssociatedGroupingItem

return.description: Possibly return an itemMirror if the GUID is a grouping item

params.name: GUID
params.description:
GUID of the association to create the ItemMirror
                from.

classitems.description:
Creates an association based on the given options and the following cases. Cases 1, 2, 7 implemented. All else are not implemented. 1. Simple text association declared phantom.
2. Link to existing non-grouping item, phantom. This can be a URL
3. Link to existing non-grouping item, real.
4. Link to existing grouping item, phantom.
5. Link to existing grouping item, real.
6. Create new local non-grouping item.
7. Create new local grouping item.
Throws NullArgumentException when options, or callback is null.
Throws InvalidTypeException when options is not an object and callback is not a function.
Throws MissingParameterException when an argument is missing for an expected case.
classitems.name: createAssociation

params.name: options
params.description: Data to create an new association for.

props.name: displayText
props.description:
Display text for the association.
                  Required in all cases.

props.name: itemURI
props.description: URI of the item. Required for case 2 & 3. Note: Please ensure "http://" prefix exists at the beginning of the string when referencing a Web URL and not an Item.

props.name: localItemRequested
props.description:
True if the local item is
                  requested, else false. Required for cases 2 & 3.

props.name: groupingItemURI
props.description:
URI of the grouping item.
                  Required for cases 4 & 5.

props.name: xooMLDriverURI
props.description:
URI of the XooML driver for the
                  association. Required for cases 4 & 5.

props.name: localItem
props.description:
URI of the new local
                  non-grouping/grouping item. Required for cases 6 & 7.

props.name: isGroupingItem
props.description:
True if the item is a grouping
                  item, else false. Required for cases 6 & 7.

params.name: callback
params.description: Function to execute once finished.

props.name: error
props.description:
Null if no error has occurred
                   in executing this function, else an contains
                   an object with the error that occurred.

props.name: GUID
props.description: GUID of the association created.

return.description:
True if the association of the given GUID is a
phantom association. False otherwise.

classitems.description:
Upgrades a given association without a local item. Local item is named by a truncated form of the display name of this ItemMirror if the localItemURI is not given, else uses given localItemURI. Always truncated to 50 characters. ONLY SUPPORTS SIMPLE PHANTOM ASSOCIATION TO ASSOCIATION WITH GROUPING ITEM Throws NullArgumentException when options is null.
Throws MissingParameterException when options is not null and a required argument is missing.
Throws InvalidTypeException if GUID is not a string, and if callback is not a function.
Throws InvalidState if the association with the given GUID cannot be upgraded.

params.name: options
params.description: Data to construct a new ItemMirror with

props.name: GUID
props.description: of the association to be upgraded. Required

props.name: localItemURI
props.description:
URI of the local item to be used if
                 a truncated display name is not the intended behavior.
                 Optional.

params.name: callback
params.description: Function to execute once finished.

props.name: error
props.description:
Null if no error has occurred
                   in executing this function, else an contains
                   an object with the error that occurred.

                   in executing this function, else an contains
                   an object with the error that occurred.

props.name: GUID
props.description: The GUID of the association that was updated.

classitems.description:
A special method that is used for certain file operations where
calling a sync won't work. Essentially it is the save function,
sans syncing. This should __never__ be called be an application.
classitems.name: _unsafeWrite

classitems.description:
Checks if an association's associatedItem is a grouping item Throws NullArgumentException if GUID, callback is null.
Throws InvalidTypeException if GUID is not a String, and if callback is not an function.
classitems.name: isAssociationAssociatedItemGrouping

return.description:
True if the association with the given GUID's associatedItem is a grouping
item, otherwise false.

params.name: GUID
params.description: GUID of the association to be to be checked.

classitems.description: Lists the GUIDs of each association.

return.description: Array of the GUIDs of each association

classitems.description:
Throws NullArgumentException if attributeName, GUID, or namespaceURI is null.
Throws InvalidTypeException if attributeName, GUID, or namespaceURI is not a String.
Throws InvalidGUIDException if GUID is not a valid GUID.

The association namespace attribute with
 the given attributeName and the given namespaceURI within the
 association with the given GUID.

params.name: GUID

classitems.description:
Sets the association namespace attribute with the given attributeName and the given namespaceURI within the association with the given GUID. Throws NullArgumentException if attributeName, attributeValue, GUID, or namespaceURI is null.
Throws InvalidTypeException if attributeName, attributeValue, GUID, or namespaceURI is not a String.
Throws InvalidGUIDException if GUID is not a valid GUID.

params.name: uri
params.description: Namespace URI

classitems.description:
Adds the given attributeName to the association with the given GUID and namespaceURI. Throws NullArgumentException if attributeName, GUID, or namespaceURI is null.
Throws InvalidTypeException if attributeName, GUID, or namespaceURI is not a String.
Throws InvalidGUIDException if GUID is not a valid GUID.
Throws an InvalidStateException when the given attributeName has already been added.
classitems.name: addAssociationNamespaceAttribute

params.name: attributeName
params.description: Name of the attribute.

params.name: attributeValue
params.description: Value of the attribe to be set

params.name: GUID
params.description: GUID of the association.

params.name: uri
params.description: Namespace URI

classitems.description:
Removes the given attributeName to the association with the given GUID and namespaceURI. Throws NullArgumentException if attributeName, GUID, or namespaceURI is null.
Throws InvalidTypeException if attributeName, GUID, or namespaceURI is not a String.
Throws InvalidGUIDException if GUID is not a valid GUID.
Throws an InvalidStateException when the given attributeName is not an attribute.
classitems.name: removeAssociationNamespaceAttribute

params.name: attributeName

classitems.description:
Sets the association namespace data for an association with the given GUID and given namespaceURI using the given data. Throws NullArgumentException if data, GUID, or namespaceURI is null.
Throws InvalidTypeException if data, GUID, or namespaceURI is not a String.
Throws InvalidGUIDException if GUID is not a valid GUID.

Association namespace data to set. Must be
                              valid fragmentNamespaceData.

classitems.description:
Uses the specified ItemDriver and SyncDriver to synchronize the
local ItemMirror object changes. This is an implmentation of Synchronization
Driver which modifies the XooML Fragment according to the real structure
under the item described.
classitems.name: sync

params.name: callback
params.description: Function to execute once finished.

props.name: error
props.description:
Null if no error has occurred
                   in executing this function, else an contains
                   an object with the error that occurred.

classitems.description: Reloads the XooML Fragment
classitems.name: refresh

params.name: callback
params.description: Function to execute once finished.

props.name: error
props.description:
Null if no error has occurred
                   in executing this function, else an contains
                   an object with the error that occurred.

return.description:
The itemMirror that created this current
itemMirror, if it has one. Note that this isn't the same as
asking for a 'parent,' since multiple itemMirrors can possibly
link to the same one

classitems.description:
Saves the itemMirror object, writing it out to the
fragment. Fails if the GUID generated on last write for the
itemMirror and the XooML fragment don't match.
classitems.name: save

props.name: error
props.description:
Returns false if everything went ok,
 otherwise returns the error

classitems.description: Checks if the AssociatedItem String passed into it is a URL or not.

True if it is an HTTP URL, false otherwise
(HTTPS will fail)

format('/');

classitems.description: Thrown when a method is not yet implemented.
classitems.name: NotImplementedException

classitems.description: Thrown when a required property from a method's options is missing.
classitems.name: MissingParameterException

classitems.description:
Thrown when an argument is given a null value when it does not accept null
values.
classitems.name: NullArgumentException

classitems.description:
Thrown when an argument is given a value with a different type from the
expected type.
classitems.name: InvalidTypeException

classitems.description:
Thrown when an a method is called when the object is in invalid state
given what the method expected.
classitems.name: InvalidStateArgument

classitems.description: Thrown after receiving an exception from XooMLU Storage
classitems.name: XooMLUException

classitems.description: Thrown after receiving an exception from ItemU Storage
classitems.name: ItemUException

classitems.description: Thrown after an association was upgraded that could not be upgraded.
classitems.name: NonUpgradeableAssociationException

classitems.description: Thrown after an argument was passed in an invalid state than expected.
classitems.name: InvalidArgumentException

classitems.description: Thrown after expecting a file or folder not to exist when it does.
classitems.name: FileOrFolderAlreadyExistsException

classitems.description: Thrown when expecting the ItemMirror to be current, and it is not.
classitems.name: FileOrFolderAlreadyExistsException

Checks if each option within the given checkedOptions is a property of
the given options.
